testsuite.name: User - Operations about users - Login & Logout

testcase.name: As a End User, A Unauthorized user can not login to the application using API

failure.message: Invalid user credentials allowed expected:<401> but was:<200>

testcase.failure: Invalid user credentials allowed expected:<401> but was:<200>
testcase.system-err: Invalid user credentials allowed expected:<401> but was:<200> com.serene.tests.features.steps.generic.LoginAPISteps.verifyLoginFailure(LoginAPISteps.java:55) com.serene.tests.features.steps.stepDefinition.LoginStepDefn.login_failed(LoginStepDefn.java:64) ✽.login failed(src/test/resources/features/Login/Login.feature:8)

testcase.name: As a End User, A Valid user with wrong password can not login to the application using API
